channel.title: The worst forum ever
channel.description:
In my opinion, touchofdeathforums is the worst. I was just browsing the forum. I made a topic to ask for help. Then I got perm banned with the reason "Go away". Lol.
Which forum do you think is the worst forum ever?

item.title: The worst forum ever
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

This’ll just turn into a spam fest, so i’m afraid that i’m going to have to lock it.

item.title: The worst forum ever
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:7, topic:388255”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=484080.msg3546555#msg3546555 date=1301225819]
R00n-seber.org.

Full of wannabe programmers (apart from them that are loyal to Mopar too), I posted a hack warning on there and all I got was idiots trying to correct me when they couldn’t quite grasp what I was going on about.

I posted it in the server downloads section like I did here, it got locked and then moved to some desolate board where no one goes. Here it got stickied.

So I just gave up with the place. Hate it with a passion now.
[/quote]
Because the Moderation and Administration is high-standard as far as I’ve seen. I don’t even find a thread or topic that has flame, or spam.

OT: I hated Rune-Zone, the owner was a complete mess and idiot (including the amount of time it has been online in the past).[/quote]
Hardly - I got 2 pages of negative comments for something that was genuinely helpful. So fuck them. They’re mostly stuck-up. At least here we’re real, down to earth human beings.

Read full topic
